name: Devil Egg
description:
protect an egg for the devil. the angels will throw anything at you to destroy the eggs. you can protect the egg by using your wall placements (right-click ) and to shoot (left-click).

the Ludum dare - kopie .zip file are the assets from the game. the Devil Egg is the game.

follow me on instagram if you want to see more games from me:
